commercialBuildings.notes: value converted from 75Pa to 4Pa assuming a flow exponent of 0.65

fractionRadiant.notes: split by activity and building type

seatedTheater.reference: ASHRAE Handbook.(2009). Fundamentals. Atlanta, GA: American Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers, Inc.

seatedTheaterNight.reference: ASHRAE Handbook.(2009). Fundamentals. Atlanta, GA: American Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air-Conditioning Engineers, Inc.

office.reference: Griffith,B., Long,N., Torcellini,P., Judkoff,R., Crawley,D., & Ryan,J. (2008). Methodology for modeling building energy performance across the commercial sector. U.S.A: National Renewable Energy Laboratory.
office.notes: minimum value based on allowable values in EnergyPlus
